title: Ken En Ken: Aoki Kagayaki
alternative_title: Xuan-Yuan Sword: Lights of the Bleak, 軒轅剣・蒼き曜
description: Ken En Ken: Aoki Kagayaki is based on the 2004 Taiwanese role-playing game Xuan Yuan Jian Waizhuan: Cang zhi Tao, whose story is set in the Spring and Autumn period of Chinese history (approximately 770–476 BC).
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Demons>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>]
